affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

word_mean_info__list.difference: 最常用词，通常指在争论、辩论、竞选或竞赛以及其它各种矛盾冲突中站在对立面的“对手”或“敌手”。
指与某人目标一致而想赶上或超过他的人，匹敌者。
语气较强，多用于书面文字和诗歌中。指不仅敌对，而且很危险，怀有很深的敌意。
指为同一目标或目的竞争者，一般无感情色彩。

word_group.brief_definition: 不可小觑的对手；劲敌；值得尊敬的对手
冠军水准的对手；有着冠军实力的对手
大麻的反对者；反对毒品者；反对大麻者
顶级的对手；顶级对手；顶尖对手
指责对手；斥责对手；排斥对手

bilingual.source: He is my old opponent in chess.
bilingual.target: 他是我在象棋中的老对手。
他的拳头击中了对手的脸。

bilingual.source: He used a hold to subdue his opponent.
bilingual.target: 他用擒拿法制服了对手。

bilingual.source: He trains hard to defeat his opponent.
bilingual.target: 他努力训练以战胜对手。

bilingual.source: The ram used its horns to ram its opponent.
Don't let the opponent psych you out.
bilingual.target: 不要让对手使你精神紧张。

bilingual.source: The boxer jabbed his opponent in the face.
The boxer hits his opponent in the face.
bilingual.target: 拳击手击打了对手的脸。

list.abstract: Opponent，英文单词，名词、形容词，作名词时意为“对手；反对者；敌手”，作形容词时意为“对立的；敌对的”。

yingyinNormal.en: A heartbeat away from the presidency is a serious matter now. Conway is a tough opponent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 据总统只有一步之遥，现在得严肃对待了。康威是个不好对付的对手。

yingyinNormal.en: Game? Yes. And you've been playing without an opponent. Which is, as you may have guessed, against the rules.
yingyinNormal.zh: 游戏?是的，这场找不到对手的游戏你已玩得够久了。不过这违反游戏规则。

yingyinNormal.en: You're a big supporter of my opponent. He's a forward-thinking guy and a friend, who should be president right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你给了我对手很大支持。他是个高瞻远瞩的人也是我朋友，他现在应该是总统。

yingyinNormal.en: I guess that means the system is working. I guess it does. You're about as tough an opponent as they come, Francis.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想这也说明我们的体制运转良好。我也这么看。你是我遇到过的最强劲的对手了，弗兰西斯。

yingyinNormal.en: All that proves is that I'm honest, unlike a president who would use the Department of Justice to target his political opponent for his own personal gain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这只能证明我的诚实，不像总统那样为了个人利益，利用司法部去攻击他的对手。

yingyinNormal.en: I have been campaigning with Francis for 30 years. You don't ever let the opponent walk all over you. If you're getting attacked, you fight back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我与弗兰西斯已经共同竞选了三十年，不能让对手骑在你头上，如果受到攻击，就还击。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, of course, as some of you may read in the papers, and, hear from the television pundits that my opponent has a ten-point lead here in New Hampshire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，你们中一些人可能在报纸上读到了，也听到电视上的权威人士说了，我的对手在新罕布什尔有10个百分点的领先。

yingyinNormal.en: Matthews, in our history, he's the biggest known unknown. And I almost forgot. The boy wonder is here. My worthy opponent. Out of his element and stuck in mine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从以往来看，马修是我们已知的最大未知数。我差点忘了，金童也来了。我不容小觑的对手。他坐立不安，我却如鱼得水。

yingyinNormal.en: When Underwood loses, you'll spend the next two years fighting off a primary opponent. Every one of our 200,000 members in Ohio will turn on you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等安德伍德输了，你接下来两年可就有仗要打了，我们在俄亥俄的二十万会员都会反对你。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: someone who competes against or fights another in a contest or argument

examination_example.sentence: Still, we need to be careful not to accuse <highlight>opponents</highlight> of bad arguments too quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，我们需要注意，不要太快指出对手的论点是不好的。

examination_example.sentence: A large part of evaluation is calling out bad arguments, but we also need to admit good arguments by <highlight>opponents</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大部分评价是指出不好的论点，但我们也需要承认对手的好论点。

examination_example.sentence: Pairs of <highlight>opponents</highlight> hit the ball back and forth until one winner emerges from all who entered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一群对手来回击球，直到在所有进入者中出现一名胜利者。

sense_info_list.en: a person who disagrees with or resists a proposal or practice

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Opponents</highlight> of change among the regulators insist that keeping outsiders out of a law firm isolates lawyers from the pressure to make money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 监管部门中反对改革的人坚持认为，不让外部人士涉足法律事务所业务可避免律师迫于压力只顾挣钱。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

word_usage.usage: opponent of sth.表示“……的反对者”，如：opponents of abortion 反对堕胎的人

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: someone who competes against or fights another in a contest or argument
a person who disagrees with or resists a proposal or practice

examination_example.sentence: While the city council vote was met with applause inside the council room, <highlight>opponents</highlight> to the measure, including soda lobbyists, made sharp criticisms and a promise to challenge the tax in court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管市政府投票在议事厅获得了赞扬支持，但包括汽水游说者在内的反对者对这项措施提出了尖锐的批评，并承诺将在法院质疑这项征税。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: someone who competes against or fights another in a contest or argument

examination_example.sentence: Arguing is that you and your <highlight>opponent</highlight> present your concerns and discuss the feelings and issues related to those concerns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 争论是你和你的对手提出你的担忧，并讨论与这些担忧相关的感受和问题。

examination_example.sentence: On every single move you have to analyze a situation, process what your <highlight>opponent</highlight> (对手) is doing and evaluate the best move.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在每一步行动中，你都必须分析形势，考虑对手的行动，评估出最佳的一步。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: someone who competes against or fights another in a contest or argument

examination_example.sentence: When it was my <highlight>opponent</highlight>’s(对手的)turn, everyone was screaming his name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 轮到我的对手时，大家都在喊他的名字。
